item.title: The Cynical Sympathizers of Murder
item.description: Everyone has grievances, but no one is exempt from the rules of our constitutional order.

item.title: Godspeed to DOGE
item.description: Expectations for Elon Musk’s plan to root out government inefficiency need to be tempered, but we welcome the effort.

item.title: Connecticut’s Fiscal Death Wish
item.description: The state may weaken or remove entirely a set of ‘guardrails’ that have kept it from budgetary ruin.

item.title: An Outpouring of Pro-Terrorist Sentiment
item.description: Assassination is evidently now an acceptable tool of social change.

item.title: The Fall of Assad
item.description: It’s difficult to shed any tears about the fall of an evil dictator. But our hopes for a new Syria will be tempered by trepidation.
